mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.type AS "type", a.sender AS "sender", a.receiver AS "receiver", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_message( id, title, content, type, sender, receiver, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_message SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type = #{type}, sender = #{sender}, receiver = #{receiver}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
